ComicInfo.Title: The New Marilyn Marone; Field & Scream; Scenes We'd Like To See: One Against Four; MAD Greeting Cards; What They're Saying Around The Solar System; Future TV Ads; Don Giovanni; Future TV Ads; Orson Bean Opens His Family Album
ComicInfo.Summary:
The New Marilyn Marone: A comparison of Marilyn's career before and after acting lessons.
Field & Scream: Excerpts from hunters' magazine, including some phony ads.
Scenes We'd Like To See: One Against Four: Man defeats 4 pirates one-at-a-time while rescuing a woman but is then surrounded by the next 4 pirates.
MAD Greeting Cards: A collection of greeting cards for unusual events such as being evicted and losing your job.
What They're Saying Around The Solar System: Opinions of earth culture by beings from other bodies in our solar system.
Future TV Ads: Phony ad storyboard for Billie's Rope Mart.
Don Giovanni: The story of the comic opera Don Giovanni is told with special emphasis on what makes it funny.
Future TV Ads: Phony ad storyboard for Ringwort's Rat Poison Pills.
Orson Bean Opens His Family Album: Vignettes of Orson's family from Revolutionary times to present.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Wally Wood,Jack Davis,Phil Interlandi,Bob Clarke,Basil Wolverton,Don Martin
ComicInfo.Inker: Wally Wood,Jack Davis,Phil Interlandi,Bob Clarke,Basil Wolverton,Don Martin
